SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM ,U.USR_ID ,P.COM_NM ,P.POS_NM ,U.USR_NM ,CONCAT(U.USR_NM, ' (', IFNULL(RIGHT(YEAR, 2), ''), ',', CASE U.GENDER WHEN 'M' THEN '남' WHEN 'W' THEN '여' ELSE '' END, ')') AS USR_INFO ,(SELECT CON_NM FROM I_CONSULTANT WHERE CON_ID = P.CON_ID) AS CON_NM ,(SELECT CON_NM FROM I_CONSULTANT WHERE CON_ID = S.CON_ID) AS REC_NM ,S.STATE_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(R.REG_DATE, "%Y-%m-%d") AS REG_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(S.STATE_DATE, "%Y-%m-%d") AS PROGRESS_DATE FROM I_REC_PRESENT R LEFT OUTER JOIN I_POSITION P ON (R.POS_ID = P.POS_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN I_USER U ON (R.USR_ID = U.USR_ID AND U.DEL_DATE IS NULL) INNER JOIN I_PRO_STATUS S ON (R.REC_ID = S.REC_ID AND S.DEL_DATE IS NULL) LEFT OUTER JOIN I_CONSULTANT C ON (P.CON_ID = C.CON_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN I_CONSULTANT C2 ON (R.CON_ID = C2.CON_ID) ,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP WHERE R.DEL_DATE IS NULL
AND (P.POS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') OR (P.COM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')) OR (C.CON_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')))
AND S.STATE IN ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'G', 'H')
AND S.STATE = #{state, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND P.COM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{comNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND P.POS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{posNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND U.USR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{usrNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND C.CON_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{conNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND C2.CON_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{recNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(R.REG_DATE, "%Y-%m-%d") BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND DATE_FORMAT(S.STATE_DATE, "%Y-%m-%d") BETWEEN #{proStartDate} AND #{proEndDate}
ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC, P.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT #{startRowNum, javaType=INT}, 15
